a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Top 1% share of income vs. Gini coefficient, 1967 to 2013
Share of pre-tax national income against Gini coefficient for equivalised disposable household income. The chart
plots all years for which there are data for both measures.
Share of Top 1% in Pre-tax national income
Source: World Wealth and Income Database (2018), LIS Key Figures
